feature_model.name: freebsd experiment 1 from thorsten

meta.data: created FM for the three sets of features for the experiment

feature_model.feature_tree: :r freebsd_exp1_tb(_r) :o sound(_r_1) :o snd_ich(_r_1_8) :o SND_FEEDER_FULL_MULTIFORMAT(_r_1_9) :o ata(_r_2) :o atapicam(_r_2_11) :o ether(_r_3) :o le(_r_3_12) :o apm(_r_4) :o apm_saver(_r_4_13) :o miibus(_r_5) :o ether(_r_6) :o ae(_r_6_14) :o usb(_r_7) :o ehci(_r_7_18) :o LIBMBPOOL(_r_10) :o pci(_r_15) :o warp_saver(_r_16) :o DEVICE_POLLING(_r_17)
